Name: Batida Rosa
Instructions: POUR soda water into ice-filled glass. SHAKE other ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled and soda-charged glass.
Review: Fruity and tropical. A tall refreshing drink for a hot evening or an afternoon beside the pool.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2008 by Jeffrey Morgenthaler at Bel Ami Lounge, Oregon, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Batida Rosa contains 159 calories
